subject: AI & Agents
title: Progressive Disclosure of AI Capabilities
description: One-minute skill: Progressive Disclosure of AI Capabilities.

hook.text: Drop users into a blank AI chat and they type 'hello.' Give them templates and they build.

buildup.text: Progressive disclosure reveals AI features gradually as users build confidence.

discovery.text: Start with templates and presets. Unlock advanced prompting for power users.

twist.text: The blank-page problem kills AI adoption. Users don't know what to ask.

climax.text: Suggest actions, show examples, and guide users to discover what the AI can do.

punchline.text: Show the easy path first. Reveal depth over time.

quiz.question: What is the 'blank page problem' in AI products?
options: Users don't know what to ask or how to start
